name: Deeper & Deeper (MagonX - Bitfall, xbeccari, charloso3224, arturgiardi, lucassivolella)
name_original: Deeper & Deeper (MagonX - Bitfall, xbeccari, charloso3224, arturgiardi, lucassivolella)
description:
What happens when the light is missing from the world? Well, that's when you have to call Deeper and Deeper, the sibling light bots to restore the light missing light prisms.

Deeper&Deeper is a puzzle game with two charismatic robots that are trying their best to reach to the end of the dungeons.

--

This was made with a lot of love in 3 days from a very lovable brazilian team!

We are playing to launch the game with more levels later. Keep an eye here :)
